manga.title: One Piece
manga.synopsis: Gol D. Roger was known as the "Pirate King," the strongest and most infamous being to have sailed the Grand Line. The capture and execution of Roger by the World Government brought a change throughout the world. His last words before his death revealed the existence of the greatest treasure in the world, One Piece.
manga.author: Eiichiro Oda

characters.name: Monkey D. Luffy
characters.description: Is the main protagonist of the manga and anime, One Piece. He is the founder and captain of the increasingly infamous and powerful Straw Hat Pirates.

characters.name: Roronoa Zoro
characters.description: Is a swordsman and combatant of the Straw Hat Pirates and a former bounty hunter.

characters.name: Sanji
characters.description: Is a pirate and the chef of the Straw Hat Pirates.

characters.name: Shanks
characters.description: Is the leader of the Red Hair Pirates and a member of the Yonko that rule over the New World.

characters.name: Gol D. Roger
characters.description: Was a legendary pirate who, as the captain of the Roger Pirates, held the title of Pirate King and owned the legendary treasure known as "One Piece".

manga.title: Attack on titan
manga.synopsis: Eren Yeager lives with his foster sister Mikasa Ackerman and best friend Armin Arlert in the town of Shiganshina adjacent to Wall Maria, outermost of three circular walls protecting humanity from man-eating Titans that are said to have killed all other humans one hundred years prior.
manga.author: Hajime Isayama

characters.name: Eren Yeager
characters.description: is a former member of the Survey Corps and the main protagonist of Attack on Titan. He lived in the Shiganshina District with his parents and adopted sister Mikasa Ackerman until the fall of Wall Maria. During the incident, Eren impotently witnessed his mother being eaten by a Titan. This event aroused in Eren an intense hatred towards the Titans, and he swore to wipe all of them off the face of the Earth.

characters.name: Mikasa Ackerman
characters.description: Is the adoptive sister of Eren Yeager and one of the two deuteragonists of the series, along with Armin Arlert. After her biological parents were murdered by human traffickers, Mikasa was rescued by Eren Yeager and lived with him and his parents, Grisha and Carla, before the fall of Wall Maria.

characters.name: Levi Ackerman
characters.description: Is a Captain in the Survey Corps, rumored to be the strongest soldier alive.

characters.name: Armin Arlert
characters.description: Is an elite soldier in the Survey Corps. He is also a childhood friend of Eren Yeager and Mikasa Ackerman, and one of the two deuteragonists of the series. He is currently an officer in the Survey Corps.

characters.name: Erwin Smith
characters.description: Was the 13th commander of the Survey Corps. Discerning, intelligent, and widely respected, Erwin was an able commander.

manga.title: Code geass
manga.synopsis: After invading Japan using giant robot weapons called Knightmares, he powerful Empire of Britannia takes over the country and renames it "Area 11" and its people, "Elevens."
manga.author: Ichirō Ōkouchi

characters.name: Lelouch vi Britannia
characters.description: Is the protagonist of Code Geass. After he was exiled he used the alias, Lelouch Lamperouge. He was the Eleventh Prince of the Holy Britannian Empire and the son of the 98th Emperor of Britannia, Charles zi Britannia.

characters.name: C.C.
characters.description: Is the tritagonist of Code Geass. Her seiyu is Yukana while she is voiced by Kate Higgins in the English dub. C.C. is not her real name; she involuntarily reveals her real name to Lelouch in her sleep, but it is muted so the viewers cannot hear it.

characters.name: Suzaku Kururugi
characters.description: Is a handsome young man with light brown hair and forest green eyes. He is rather tall, being slightly shorter than Lelouch. Like most characters in the series, he also is rather skinny, belying his extreme physical prowess.

characters.name: Cornelia li Britannia
characters.description: Is the second princess of the Britannian Imperial Family and is Lelouch's half-sister. She is extremely skilled in Knightmare Frame combat and completed the establishment of Area 18 shortly before arriving in Area 11.

characters.name: Charles zi Britannia
characters.description: He had a Geass power that allowed him to suppress and alter the memories of those he achieved eye contact with, but lost this power in exchange for V.V.'s code which granted him immortality.
